Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Strongman and Sabotage
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's brief stint as a circus strongman and his confrontation with the jealous former strongman, Matto Grasso, who attempts to sabotage the circus out of revenge.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Paul Bunyan and Circus Life
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Paul Bunyan in a circus setting and establishes the arrival of the circus in town, drawing public attention and excitement.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Conflict with Billings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Paul Bunyan, disguised, intervening in a threatening situation inside a circus tent, leading to a confrontation with Billings and revealing Paul Bunyan's strength.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Revenge and Paul Bunyan's Heroics
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Matto Grasso's vengeful scheme to sabotage Paul Bunyan and the circus, and Paul Bunyan's heroic intervention to save the day and the circus from disaster.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaimed Performance and Matto Grasso's Jealousy
Matto Grasso's New Scheme: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico's Escape and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action
Continued Escape and Second Weight Attempt
Spectator Observation and Paul Bunyan's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventure and Hi-Toun Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Marco Polo's adventures, starting with a flashback to Tibet and then shifting to his arrival in Hi-Toun, where he gets involved in the mystery of a missing princess and a strange encounter with an ogress.

sub_scenes.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Tale and Initial Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Marco Polo's adventurous past in Tibet and transitions to a new mystery involving a severed head in a forest.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Quest for Princess Lotus
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Marco Polo's arrival in Hi-Toun, his misunderstanding of the city's atmosphere, and his agreement to help the King find the missing Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Misinterpretation of Festivities
Marco's Introduction and the King's Welcome
The King's Plea for Help Regarding Princess Lotus
Marco's Agreement to Help Find Princess Lotus

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with the Ogress
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Marco Polo's encounter with a mourning woman who leads him into a trap, revealing herself to be the 'Awful Ogress of Tibet'.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with a Mourning Woman in Need
The Mourning Woman's Plea and the Ominous Destination
Entering the Mysterious Castle and the Rat Revelation
The Ogress's Transformation and Marco's Imprisonment
Confrontation with Giant Rats and the Ogress
The Special Knife and Ogre's Defeat
Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Misunderstood Mourning and Arrival at Palace

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of treasure, betrayal, and revenge set in a British penal colony and later in England, focusing on the prisoner Jordan's quest for retribution against Captain Brooking who stole his treasure.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Treasure Tale and Penal Colony Life
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the treasure tale with a framing narrative and establishes the harsh setting of a British penal colony in the tropics.

narrative_arcs.title: Officer's Request to Speak with Captain Brooking

sub_scenes.title: The Prisoner's Bargain and Captain's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the prisoner Jordan's desperate bargain with Captain Brooking, revealing the treasure and offering a deal for escape, which ultimately leads to betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Treasure and Desperate Bargain
The Agreement and Promise of Escape
Release from Prison and Return to England
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Violent Confrontation for Treasure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Jordan's relentless pursuit of Captain Brooking to England, their confrontation, and a parallel story of deadly greed for another treasure.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Continued Vigil
Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal
The Wounded Man and the Chest

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Henry Northrup's investigation into the haunted Matthews estate, unraveling the tragic story of Vincent Matthews and his murdered sister, Rosalind, and ultimately leading to the release of their tormented spirits.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a violent scene involving Dr. Styx and then transitions to the courtroom sentencing of Vincent Matthews, setting up the background for the haunted estate.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Resolution with the Ghosts
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Henry Northrup's investigation inside the Matthews estate, his confrontation with Vincent Matthews' ghost, and the subsequent supernatural resolution involving forgiveness and brotherly love.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring the Warning and Entering the House
The Revelation of the Murdered Sister
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: The Tragic Voyages of Henry Hudson
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc narrates the ill-fated voyages of Henry Hudson in search of the Northwest Passage to China, culminating in mutiny and his tragic abandonment in the Arctic.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Hudson's Voyages and Dutch Commission
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Henry Hudson's historical context and his commission by the Dutch East India Company to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Hudson

sub_scenes.title: First Voyage and Hudson River Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hudson's first voyage, the crew's discontent, the turn south, and the exploration of the Hudson River, ending in disappointment and return to Holland.

narrative_arcs.title: Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Acceptance of Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: Second Voyage, Arctic Entrapment, and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Hudson's second voyage, the ship getting trapped in ice in the Arctic, leading to crew discontent, mutiny, and Hudson's abandonment.

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tartar Ransom
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Arabian Knight, Hassan, on his mission to rescue the kidnapped daughter of Ali-Ben-Ali from the one-eyed Tatar leader, Kurgan, showcasing his bravery, cunning, and combat skills.

sub_scenes.title: Mission Briefing and Journey to Tartar Territory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Hassan and his mission, given by the Caliph, to rescue the kidnapped daughter and sets him on his journey towards the Tartar territory.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Oasis Discovery: Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration, Rescue Attempt, and Challenge by Kurgan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Hassan's approach and infiltration of the Tartar camp, his attempt to contact the prisoner, leading to his discovery and challenge by Kurgan.

narrative_arcs.title: Internal Resolve and Desperate Need to Win

sub_scenes.title: The Contest and Honorable Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the contest where Hassan faces three Tartar warriors, his unconventional fighting strategy, his victory, and the honorable resolution with Kurgan.

narrative_arcs.title: Signal for Contest and Hassan's Strategy
Plea for Mercy and Honorable Agreement
Imminent Departure and a Parting Kiss
A Fine Reward and Continued Journey
